decisions.name: Decision_Existing_Loan_Account_as_per_PAN
decisions.label: Decision Existing Loan Account as per PAN

formulas.name: faultMsg
formulas.expression: MID( {!$Flow.FaultMessage}, FIND("EXCEPTION:", {!$Flow.FaultMessage}) + LEN("EXCEPTION:"), FIND("You can look up", {!$Flow.FaultMessage}, FIND("EXCEPTION:", {!$Flow.FaultMessage})) - FIND("EXCEPTION:", {!$Flow.FaultMessage}) - LEN("EXCEPTION:"))

fields.name: ApplicantModificationNotAllowed
fields.fieldText: Addition/Modification of applicant(s) are not allowed at this stage. Kindly move to the DDE stage for addition/modification to any applicant.

fields.name: LAExist
fields.fieldText: This {!Pan_Number} is already exist with other applicant, Please use different PAN for proceed!!
